text: Nymphomaniac is a 2013 two-part erotic drama movie. It was directed by Lars von Trier. It is about a nymphomaniac who meets an asexual virgin and tells him about her sexual adventures. In the movie are Charlotte Gainsbourg, Stacy Martin, Stellan Skarsgard, Shia LaBeouf, Uma Thurman and Christian Slater. The movie was released on December 25, 2013 in Denmark. It was released in early 2014 in some other countries. It was filmed in Germany and Belgium in 2012. The Guardian gave the movie four out of five stars. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2013 drama movies Category:2013 LGBT movies Category:Adultery in movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:Belgian LGBT movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:Danish LGBT movies Category:English-language movies Category:French drama movies Category:French LGBT movies Category:German drama movies Category:German LGBT movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:Swedish LGBT movies Category:LGBT drama movies Category:LGBT erotic movies Category:Movies about virginity Category:Rape in movies Category:Movies directed by Lars von Trier Category:Movies about pedophilia
title: Nymphomaniac (movie)
